channel.title: FaaS on Jim Shingler Blog
channel.description: Recent content in FaaS on Jim Shingler Blog

item.title: XaaS
item.description: 1. Abstract Cloud offers a variety of solutions and approaches: IaaS, CaaS, PaaS, FaaS, and SaaS. It isn’t always clear which solutions and approaches are appropriate. The purpose of this paper is to clarify the approaches, their implications, appropriate usage, and confirm Intents. I am trying something new. I am going write this blog post in the open. I will start writing my thoughts and ideas, and you will be able to see and comment on the blog as it is developed.
